fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Factionalize somebody at night, choosing a faction to replace their role with.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- People who you factionalize gain the ability/attributes (excluding factional attack/kill) of a random role of a faction you pick. Factionalized players keep their original win cons, and will remain in any factional chats they were previously in.
- Neutral counts as a faction.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If this is part of the Daily Streak Faction, you can pick roles to swap people to. However, the host may veto your role choice, in which case the host will inform you that your choice was vetoed and will randomly give the player a role from the faction of the role you chose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See roles from 4 different factions win.
